Virtual Assistant.title: Virtual Assistant
Virtual Assistant.tagline: “You stay in control. We handle the work, keep you updated, and make sure nothing falls through the cracks.”
Virtual Assistant.description: Your time is valuable. Let us handle the tasks that eat up your day.
examples: Sorting through 200 emails and flagging the 5 that need your attention
Booking your entire conference trip, from flights to dinner reservations
Researching vendors and creating a comparison spreadsheet
Scheduling meetings across three time zones without the back-and-forth
Posting your blog content to LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook
Virtual Assistant.cta: Quick Chat ($20)15 minutes to discuss your needs

Data & Documents.title: Data & Documents
Data & Documents.tagline: “No judgment, just results. We have seen it all and we know how to fix it. Your messy data becomes our clean deliverable.”
Data & Documents.description: Messy spreadsheets and formatting nightmares? We turn chaos into clarity.
examples: Taking 5 messy spreadsheets and turning them into one organized database
Formatting your quarterly report so it actually looks professional
Entering 500 business cards into a clean, searchable contact list
Creating templates for your invoices, proposals, and reports
Organizing years of files into a system that makes sense
Data & Documents.cta: Quick Chat ($20)15 minutes to discuss your needs

Website Services.title: Website Services
Website Services.tagline: “We handle the tech so you do not have to. No jargon, no confusion, just a website that works the way you need it to.”
Website Services.description: Your website should work for you, not give you a headache.
examples: Building a professional website for your small business from scratch
Updating your homepage, fixing broken links, and adding new pages
Setting up your online store so you can start selling
Keeping your site secure, updated, and running smoothly every month
Fixing that one thing that has been broken for weeks (you know what it is)
Website Services.cta: Quick Chat ($20)15 minutes to discuss your needs
